DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate orally disintegrate tablet sildenafil similar pharmacokinetic property give food without food .
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetics Of Sildenafil Orally Disintegrating Tablet Formulation Given With Or Without Food .
DOC.criteria: Otherwise healthy male subject age 45 year old without erectile dysfunction . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 17.5 32.5 kg/m2 . Signed Informed Consent . Evidence history clinically significant abnormality Have baseline orthostatic hypotension Positive drug screen , excessive alcohol tobacco use
DOC.keyword: Bioavailability Food Effect Oral Dissolving Tablet ( ODT )
